entry.title: JSB Bluntman & Chronic Horizontal Rolling Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jay and Silent Bob
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 3.40 - 4.60 (2 variants)

Jay & Silent Bob strike back with an all-new line of rolling trays. These trays are mad notes! Available in small and medium, they’re top quality and a must-have for any JSB fan. An everyday essential item, rolling trays are one of the most useful accessories for cannabis users everywhere. Beyond rolling, you can use your tray to reduce clutter and conveniently store you kit, or to easily take your kit with you on the go. Whether it’s convenience or portability you’re after, Jay & Silent Bob rolling Trays will deliver the good.

  • Made from Thick Metal Alloy
  • Extremely Smooth Glossy Surface
  • High Edges with Rounded Corners
  • Available in Small and Medium
  • 7 Exclusive Designs

The JSB “15 Bucks” rolling tray features Jay & Bob against a green background with the iconic quote overhead. It offers a smooth, glossy surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners.

entry.title: Famous X 59mm Acrylic Grinder – Tray of 12 – Black/Red/White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Grinder
Price: 19.99

Affordable quality X smart design. This is Famous X, a collection which brings you functional everyday cannabis products at affordable prices.

The Famous X 59mm Acrylic Grinder is a lightweight, easy-to-use grinder with a classic 2-piece design. It’s sharp, pointed teeth will make short work of even the most dese buds. It’s low cost and consistent functionality make it a perfect addition to any stoner’s kit, for beginners and veterans like.

 

  • Lightweight acrylic body
  • Sharp, pointed teeth
  • Classic 2-piece design
  • Available in 3 varieties
  • POP display tray included
  • 60mm diameter
  • Assorted tray of 12

entry.title: Canadian Lumber-Greens Cones-98/26-Medium 24 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canadian Lumber
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 42.00

Unrefined, unbleached, and 100% all-natural. Canadian Lumber All-Natural Pre-Rolled Cones are the perfect no-fuss rolling solution for the mindful smoker.

These elegant pre-rolled cones are available in Canadian Lumber’s signature varieties: The Greens, The Woods, and The Hippy, and each variety has its own unique characteristics.

The Greens

The Greens by Canadian Lumber are slow-burning hemp papers. They are made from all-natural, unrefined hemp so unprocessed that you can see the individual raw hemp fibres. Hemp naturally holds moisture, making Canadian Lumber’s “The Greens” their slowest-burning papers. The unrefined fibres help produce a smooth, even burn that will go the distance.

The Hippy

The Hippy by Canadian Lumber are easy-rolling papers made from a 50/50 blend of Flax and Hemp. This high-percentage Flax blend produces a soft, smooth texture that is like rice paper, but free from any bleach or other harsh chemicals. The result is a smote that is both easy to roll and easy to smoke. “The Hippy” makes for an all-around pleasant and enjoyable smoking experience.

The Woods

The Woods by Canadian Lumber are ultra-thin wood pulp papers. They are made from 100% all-natural, unrefined, and unbleached wood pulp that retains its natural brown colour without the use of any dyes or harsh chemicals. Canadian Lumber has pressed these to an impressive 12.5 gsm, making them one of the thinnest wood-based papers found anywhere. For classic, ultra-thin joint papers, try spending some time in “The Woods.”


Canadian Lumber’s all-natural and unrefined rolling papers bring you as close to the raw plant as you can get.  Even the glue has been replaced with an Arabic gum seal, which is like a tree sap that is triple distilled and sourced from a conflict-free region in West Africa.  Their unbleached and unrefined papers proudly feature visible raw plant fibres and provide a smooth and natural even burn.  The papers are tested for allergens at Canada’s Guelph University and are fully TUV SUD certified for European markets. You can rest assured that with Canadian Lumber, you will be smoking as nature intended.

entry.title: Canadian Lumber Rolling Papers-1 1/4 with Tips Pack of 22
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canadian Lumber
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 29.90

Unrefined, unbleached, and 100% all-natural. Canadian Lumber Rolling Papers make an ideal companion for the mindful smoker.

These papers come in three varieties: The Greens, The Woods, and The Hippy, and each type has its own unique characteristics.

Greens

The Greens by Canadian Lumber are slow-burning hemp papers. They are made from all-natural, unrefined hemp so unprocessed that you can see the individual raw hemp fibres. Hemp naturally holds moisture, making Canadian Lumber’s “The Greens” their slowest-burning papers. The unrefined fibres help produce a smooth, even burn that will go the distance.

Woods

The Woods by Canadian Lumber are ultra-thin wood pulp papers. They are made from 100% all-natural, unrefined, and unbleached wood pulp that retains its natural brown colour without the use of any dyes or harsh chemicals. Canadian Lumber has pressed these to an impressive 12.5 gsm, making them one of the thinnest wood-based papers found anywhere. For classic, ultra-thin joint papers, try spending some time in “The Woods.”

The Hippy

The Hippy by Canadian Lumber are easy-rolling papers made from a 50/50 blend of Flax and Hemp. This high-percentage Flax blend produces a soft, smooth texture that is like rice paper, but free from any bleach or other harsh chemicals. The result is a smote that is both easy to roll and easy to smoke. “The Hippy” makes for an all-around pleasant and enjoyable smoking experience.


Canadian Lumber rolling papers are 100% all-natural including the Arabic gum seal. The Arabic gum used is similar to tree sap and sourced from a conflict-free company in West Africa. Unbleached and unrefined means that you can see the fibers still intact in the paper. This allows for a clean and natural even burn.

Canadian Lumber papers are lab-tested for allergens in Canada by Guelph University with the results published on their website. Their products are also fully TUV SUD Certified for European markets.

entry.title: Rolling Papers Irie
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 15.40

Irie rolling papers are made from a 100% natural hemp blend. They launched in Ethiopia, moved to Jamaica and are known for providing an extra smooth smoking experience. Irie papers are made without harsh chemicals and toxins sometimes found in other papers and are ideal for people who want to feel irie. These papers are interleaved for easy removal from the pack and are creased for your rolling pleasure. Irie’s hemp papers are a medium weight, which makes them perfect for beginners learning to roll and for connoisseurs who know what good paper feels like. Irie includes 64 papers in their 1 ¼ size packs, making them the quintessential pack for sharing with friends (most paper companies only contain 50!). They definitely live up to their slogan of Stuff Me, Roll Me, Smoke Me. There are 24 packs of Irie papers in a box.

entry.title: RAW UNBLEACHED 1-1/4 (24 PACK)
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 24.90

RAW Natural Rolling Papers have developed a cult-like following. RAW are pure, less processed rolling papers unlike anything that you have ever seen or smoked. Because they contain a hybrid blend of unbleached (not chlorine whitened) fibers, the paper is a translucent natural light brown color. RAW is so thin that you can see through it.
